en.name: swarm.city
en.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City is a decentralized commerce platform.
en.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Enabled by the SWT token, running on the Ethereum blockchain
en.Locally on your device no central databa: locally on your device, no central database
en.Its an open source project so you can ju: It's an open source project, so you can jump right in
en.No account was found: No account was found. When you restore or create a new account, it's stored locally on your device.
en.Can we ask for your location: Can we ask for your location?
en.When accepting your browser will ask you: When accepting your browser will ask you to enable location services
en.How do you want to restore your account: How do you want to restore your account?
en.Do you want to stop creating your accoun: Do you want to stop creating your account?
en.This can not be undone. All progress wil: This can not be undone. All progress will be lost
en.Scroll to zoom - drag to move: Scroll to zoom - drag to move
en.The next step is choosing a password. Ch: The next step is choosing a password. Choose a password. with care.
en.There is no password recovery available: There is no password recovery available in Swarm City.
You now have a Swarm City account.
en.There are no central servers on which ac: There are no central servers on which accounts are stored.
en.This means you are responsible for your: This means you are responsible for your own account at all times.
en.Your backup is encrypted with your curre: Your backup is encrypted with your current password.
en.Your backup is encrypted with your passw: Your backup is encrypted with your password.
en.Email the account file to yourself or ch: Email the account file to yourself or choose the download option to start a direct download.
en.Be careful in displaying your private ke: Be careful in displaying your private key. It's the only thing needed to steal your funds.
en.Your account file combined with your pas: Your account file combined with your password will always give you access to your SWT balance.
en.Youve successfully printed your paper wa: You've successfully printed your paper wallet. This contains your private key, which will always give you access to your SWT balance.
en.Warning! Always keep your private key se: Warning! Always keep your private key secure. If anyone were to get ahold of it they would gain access to your SWT balance.
en.Currently no deals selected. Try a broad: Currently no deals selected. Try a broader search.
Choose an avatar and a username.
en.Lets create a backup and youre all set!: Let's create a backup and you're all set!
The file has been sent to your email.
en.To restore an account with a private key: To restore an account with a private key, please choose a password for it first.
Upload and unlock your account file.
en.Do you want to delete this account from: Do you want to delete this account from this device?
en.You can restore this account with your b: You can restore this account with your backup.
en.You are now in deal with: You are now in deal with
en.You have insufficient funds for an offer: You have insufficient funds for an offer that size.
en.Do you want to cancel the deal: Do you want to cancel the deal
You're about to accept this deal.
en.Are you sure you want to decline this de: Are you sure you want to decline this deal?
en.will be notified that you dont want to a: will be notified that you don't want to accept this deal.
selected you to make a deal.
en.already selected a provider for this req: already selected a provider for this request.
en.You didnt select a provider yet: You didn't select a provider yet.
en.This deal is in conflict. The hashtagown: This deal is in conflict. The hashtagowner has been added.
en.This cant be undone. The funds will be l: This can’t be undone. The funds will be locked and the hashtag provider will be notified and try to solve this conflict.
en.This cant be undone. The hashtag owner w: This can’t be undone. The hashtag owner will be notified that the conflict is resolved.
Hashtags are marketplaces. Soon anyone will be able to create their own, but for now this functionality is under construction. For more information about creating and maintaining hashtags, please read ‘Hashtags Revisited’ Link below.
en.The password must be at least 5 characte: The password must be at least 5 characters long.
The key is the wrong length.
en.shortcode or address is the wrong length: Error, shortcode or address is the wrong length
The private key you entered is too long.
en.The private key you entered is too short: The private key you entered is too short.
en.Ive copied my key and stored it in a saf: I’ve copied my key and stored it in a safe location, and want this to count as my backup.
en.No account was found. When you restore o: No account was found. When you restore or create a new account its stored locally on your device
en.You havent done any transactions with th: You haven't done any transactions with this account yet.
en.When you restore or create a new account: When you restore or create a new account its stored locally on your device.

cn.name: 一群市
cn.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: 一群市是一个分散的商业平台
cn.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: 由在以太坊块链上运行的SWT令牌启用
cn.Locally on your device no central databa: 您的设备中无本地中央数据库
cn.Its an open source project so you can ju: 这是一个开源项目，所以每个人都可以帮助建立
cn.No account was found: 没有找到帐户。恢复或创建新帐户时，将其存储在本地设备上。
cn.Can we ask for your location: 我们可以要求您的位置吗
cn.When accepting your browser will ask you: 接受浏览器时会要求您启用位置服务

fr.Hashtagfee: La commission pour le hashtag est de
fr.Scroll to zoom - drag to move: Tourner la molette pour zoomer - faire glisser pour déplacer
fr.Be careful in displaying your private ke: Attention à ne pas divulguer votre clé privée. C'est la seule chose nécessaire pour accéder à vos fonds.
Vous avez enfin votre compte Swarm City
fr.The next step is choosing a password. Ch: Maintenant, choisissez un mot de passe.
fr.Your account file combined with your pas: Votre compte et votre mot de passe vous permettent d’accéder à vos SWT.
fr.Email the account file to yourself or ch: Envoyez vous votre compte par email ou choisissez l'option vous permettant de le télécharger directement.
fr.within +/- 100km from your location: A plus ou moins 100km de votre position
fr.Locally on your device no central databa: localement sur votre machine, pas de base de donnée centralisée
fr.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Permis par le jeton SWT, fonctionnant sur la blockchain Ethereum
fr.This can not be undone. All progress wil: On ne peut pas revenir en arrière. Vous devrez tout recommencer
fr.name: swarm.city
fr.When accepting your browser will ask you: Une fois acceptée, votre navigateur vous demandera d'activer les services de géolocalisation
fr.Your backup is encrypted with your passw: Votre backup est encryptée par votre mot de passe.
fr.There is no password recovery available: Swarm City n'offre pas la possibilité de retrouver votre mot de passe.
fr.No account was found: Aucun compte trouvé. Lorsque vous restaurez ou créez un nouveau compte, il est stocké localement sur votre machine.
fr.There are no central servers on which ac: Les comptes ne sont en aucun cas stockés sur des serveurs centralisés.
fr.Do you want to stop creating your accoun: Voulez-vous mettre un terme à la création de votre compte ?
fr.Its an open source project so you can ju: C'est un projet Open Source auquel vous pouvez participer
fr.How do you want to restore your account: Comment souhaitez vous restaurer votre compte ?
fr.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City est une plate-forme de commerce décentralisée
Les mots de passe sont différents.
fr.This means you are responsible for your: Cela signifie que vous êtes l'unique responsable de votre compte.

nl.Scroll to zoom - drag to move: Scroll voor zoom - sleep voor verplaatsen
nl.Be careful in displaying your private ke: Wees voorzichtig bij het tonen van de private key. Jouw private key geeft directe toegang tot je tokens.
Je hebt nu een Swarm City account
nl.The next step is choosing a password. Ch: Bij de volgende stap kies je een paswoord. Denk goed na over jouw paswoord.
nl.Currently no deals selected. Try a broad: Er werden geen deals geselecteerd. Probeer een ruimere zoekopdracht.
nl.Your account file combined with your pas: Deze account file in combinatie met het paswoord zal altijd toegang geven tot jouw SWT balans.
nl.Email the account file to yourself or ch: Email de account file naar jezelf of kies de optie download om een directe download te starten.
nl.Locally on your device no central databa: draait op je toestel, geen centrale database
nl.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Mogelijk gemaakt door SWT tokens, draait op de Ethereum blockchain
nl.This can not be undone. All progress wil: Je kan dit niet ongedaan maken. Alle gegevens worden gewist.
nl.name: swarm.city
nl.When accepting your browser will ask you: Wanneer je accepteert, vraagt je browser om de locatie service te ontgrendelen
nl.Your backup is encrypted with your passw: De backup is geëncrypteerd met jouw paswoord.
nl.There is no password recovery available: Paswoord herstellen is niet mogelijk in Swarm City.
nl.No account was found: Er werd geen account gevonden. Maak een nieuw account aan of laadt een bestaand account op. Het wordt dan lokaal opgeslagen op uw toestel.
nl.There are no central servers on which ac: Er zijn geen centrale servers waar accounts worden bewaard.
nl.Do you want to stop creating your accoun: Stoppen met het creëren van een account?
nl.Its an open source project so you can ju: HEt is een opens source project, iedereen is welkom om samen te werken
nl.How do you want to restore your account: Hoe wil je je account  herinstellen?
nl.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City is een decentraal handelsplatform
nl.This means you are responsible for your: Dat betekent dat je ten alle tijde verantwoordelijk bent voor jouw account file.

ru.Scroll to zoom - drag to move: Прокрутите мышкой для увеличения - перетащите чтобы передвинуть
ru.Be careful in displaying your private ke: Будьте осторожны используя ваш приватный ключ. Злоумышленник зная его может украсть все ваши сбережения.
Поздравляем, теперь у вас есть свой Swarm City аккаунт
ru.The next step is choosing a password. Ch: Следующий шаг - выбор пароля. Придумайте безопасный пароль.
ru.Your account file combined with your pas: Ваш файл аккаунта в связке с паролем даст доступ к вашему SWT балансу.
ru.Email the account file to yourself or ch: Отправьте себе по email файл учетной записи или выберите функцию загрузки, чтобы начать скачивание
ru.within +/- 100km from your location: в пределах +/- 100 км от вашего местоположения
ru.Locally on your device no central databa: локально на вешем устройстве, без централизованной базы данных
ru.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Активируется SWT токеном, работающим на базе Ethereum блокчейн
ru.This can not be undone. All progress wil: Невозможно отменить. Весь текущий прогресс будет утерян
ru.name: swarm.city
ru.When accepting your browser will ask you: После подтверждения ваш браузер запросит включение сервисов геолокации
ru.Your backup is encrypted with your passw: Резервный файл зашифрован в связке с вашим паролем.
ru.There is no password recovery available: В Swarm City нет функции восстановления пароля!
ru.No account was found: Учетных записей не найдено. Когда вы создаете или восстанавливаете новую учетную запись, она сохраняется локально на вашем устройстве.
Вы успешно скачали свой файл аккаунта.
ru.There are no central servers on which ac: Мы не используем централизованных серверов для хранения информации об аккаунтах.
ru.Do you want to stop creating your accoun: Вы хотели бы приостановить создание аккаунта?
ru.Its an open source project so you can ju: Это открытый проект, вы можете принять в нем участие
ru.How do you want to restore your account: Как вы хотите восстановить свою учетную запись?
ru.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City - это децентрализованная коммерческая платформа
ru.This means you are responsible for your: Это значит, что вы всегда несете ответственность за свою учетную запись

de.Scroll to zoom - drag to move: Scrolle um zu zoomen - ziehe um zu bewegen
de.Be careful in displaying your private ke: Sei vorsichtig, wenn du deinen privaten Schlüsssel anzeigen lässt. Er ist das einzige was benötigt wird um dein Kapital zu stehlen.
Du hast nun ein Swarm City Konto
de.The next step is choosing a password. Ch: Der nächste Schritt ist ein Passwort zu wählen. Wähle das Passwort mit Vorsicht.
de.Your account file combined with your pas: Deine Kontodatei kombiniert mit deinem Passwort wird dir immer Zugriff auf dein SWT-Guthaben geben.
de.Email the account file to yourself or ch: Schicke dir deine Kontodatei selbst per EMail oder wähle die Downloadoption um einen direkten Download zu starten.
de.Locally on your device no central databa: lokal auf deinem Gerät, keine zentrale Datenbank.
de.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Ermöglicht durch das SWT-Token, betrieben durch die Ethereum-Blockchain
de.This can not be undone. All progress wil: Dies kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden. Jeder Fortschritt wird verloren gehen.
de.name: swarm.city
de.When accepting your browser will ask you: Nach der Akzeptierung wird der Browser fragen ob die Standort-Dienste aktiviert werden sollen.
de.Your backup is encrypted with your passw: Dein Backup ist verschlüsselt mit deinem Passwort.
de.There is no password recovery available: In Swarm City ist keine Passwortwiederherstellung möglich.
de.No account was found: Es wurde kein Konto gefunden. Wenn ein neues Konto erstellt oder ein bestehendes Konto wiederhergestellt wird, werden die Informationen auf deinem Gerät gespeichert.
de.There are no central servers on which ac: Es gibt keine zentralen Server auf welchen die Kontos gespeichert werden.
de.Its an open source project so you can ju: Es ist ein quelloffenes Projekt. Du kannst also sofort starten.
de.How do you want to restore your account: Wie willst du dein Konto wiederherstellen
de.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City ist eine dezentralisierte Handelsplattform
de.This means you are responsible for your: Dies bedeutet du bist verantwortlich für dein Konto zu jeder Zeit.

es.Scroll to zoom - drag to move: Scroll para hacer zoom - drag para mover
es.email my file: Enviar por correo electrónico mi archivo de cuenta
es.Be careful in displaying your private ke: Tenga cuidado al mostrar su clave privada. Es la única cosa necesaria para robar sus fondos.
Usted ahora tiene una cuenta con Swarm City
es.The next step is choosing a password. Ch: El proximo paso es escoger su contraseña. Escoja su contraseña con cuidado.
es.Your account file combined with your pas: La combinación entre su archivo de cuenta y su contraseña siempre le dará acceso a su balance de SWT.
es.Email the account file to yourself or ch: Envie por correo electronico el archivo de cuenta a si mismo o elija la opcion de descargar, para empezar una descarga directa.
es.Locally on your device no central databa: localmente en tu dispositivo, sin base de datos central
es.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Habilitado con el token SWT, corriendo sobre el blockchain de Ethereum
es.This can not be undone. All progress wil: Esto no se puede restablecerse. Todo progreso sera perdido.
es.name: swarm.city
es.When accepting your browser will ask you: Cuando aceptas, el navegador te pedirá el acceso a tu ubicación
es.Your backup is encrypted with your passw: Su reserva de seguridad está cifrada con su contraseña.
es.There is no password recovery available: No hay recuperación de contraseña disponible en Swarm City.
es.No account was found: Usuario no encontrado. Cuando se restablece o se crea un nuevo usuario, el perfil se almacena localmente en tu dispositivo.
Usted ha descargado su archivo de cuenta.
es.There are no central servers on which ac: No hay servidores centrales en los cuales cuentas puedan ser almacenadas.\n
es.Its an open source project so you can ju: Es un proyecto de código abierto, súbete a bordo !
es.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City es una plataforma descentralizada de comercio
es.This means you are responsible for your: Esto significa que usted es responsable de su propia cuenta en todo momento.

pl.Scroll to zoom - drag to move: Scroll aby przybliżyć - przeciągnij aby przenieść
pl.Be careful in displaying your private ke: Zachowaj ostrożność wyświetlając swój klucz prywatny. Daje on pełen dostęp do Twoich środków.
pl.The next step is choosing a password. Ch: Następnym krokiem jest wybór hasła. Wybierz je z rozwagą.
pl.Your account file combined with your pas: Plik kopii zapasowej wraz z hasłem zawsze dają dostęp do Twoich środków SWT.
pl.Email the account file to yourself or ch: Wyślij plik kopii zapasowej mailem do siebie lub wybierz opcję pobierania aby rozpocząć pobieranie bezpośrednie.
pl.Locally on your device no central databa: lokalnie na Twoim urządzeniu, bez centralnej bazy danych
pl.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Działa dzięki tokenom SWT, opartym o Ethereum.
pl.This can not be undone. All progress wil: Ta operacja jest nieodwracalna. Cały postęp zostanie utracony
pl.name: swarm.city
pl.When accepting your browser will ask you: Akceptując, zostaniesz poproszony o włączenie usług lokalizacyjnych.
pl.Your backup is encrypted with your passw: Twoja kopia zapasowa jest zaszyfrowana Twoim hasłem.
pl.There is no password recovery available: Odzyskanie hasła w Swarm City nie jest możliwe.
pl.No account was found: Nie znaleziono konta. Kiedy przywracasz istniejące lub tworzysz nowe konto, jest ono zapisywane lokalnie na Twoim urządzeniu.
pl.There are no central servers on which ac: Konta nie są zapisywane na centralnym serwerze.
pl.Its an open source project so you can ju: Projekt open source - dołącz już dziś!
pl.This means you are responsible for your: To oznacza, że zawsze jesteś odpowiedzialny za swoje własne konto.

tr.Scroll to zoom - drag to move: Zum yapmak için kaydırın - taşımak için sürükleyin.
tr.Be careful in displaying your private ke: Özel anahtarınızı görüntülerken dikkat edin. Fonlarınızı çalmak için gereken tek şey bu.
tr.The next step is choosing a password. Ch: Sonraki adım şifrenizi seçmek. Şifrenizi dikkatle seçin.
tr.Your account file combined with your pas: Hesap dosyanız ve şifrenizle birlikte her zaman SWT bakiyenize erişebilirsiniz.
tr.Email the account file to yourself or ch: Hesap dosyasını kendinize e-posta ile gönderin veya indirmeye başlamak için doğrudan indirme seçeneğini kullanın.
tr.Locally on your device no central databa: Lokal olarak cihazınızda, merkez veri tabanı yok.
tr.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Ethereum blok zincirinde çalışan SWT tokenı tarafından etkinleştirildi
tr.This can not be undone. All progress wil: Bu geri alınamaz. Tüm ilerlemeler kaybolacak
tr.name: swarm.city
tr.When accepting your browser will ask you: Kabul ederken tarayıcınız konum servislerini etkinleştirmenizi isteyecek
tr.There is no password recovery available: Swarm City'de şifre kurtarma olanağı yoktur.
tr.No account was found: Hesap bulunamadı. Eski hesabınız geri yüklediğinizde veya yeni bir hesap oluşturduğunuzda, hesap cihazınızda lokal olarak saklanır.
tr.There are no central servers on which ac: Hesapların depolandığı herhangi bir merkezi sunucu yoktur.
tr.Do you want to stop creating your accoun: Hesabınız oluşturma işlemini durdurmak istiyor musunuz?
tr.Its an open source project so you can ju: Bu açık kaynak kodlu bir projedir, doğrudan başlayabilirsiniz.
tr.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City merkezi olmayan ticaret platformudur.
tr.This means you are responsible for your: Bu, kendi hesabınızdan her zaman sorumlu olduğunuz anlamına gelir.
